data.eml:eml: Morphological and taxonomic revision of species of Squatina from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Squatiniformes: Squatinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vaz, Diego F. B., De, Marcelo R. (2013): Morphological and taxonomic revision of species of Squatina from the Southwestern Atlantic Ocean (Chondrichthyes: Squatiniformes: Squatinidae). Zootaxa 3695 (1): 1-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3695.1.1
